CmdLine: cd /tmp/ &&      wget http://pecl.php.net/get/memcache-2.2.7.tgz &&     tar zxvf memcache-2.2.7.tgz &&     cd memcache-2.2.7 &&     /home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/bin/phpize &&     ./configure --with-php-config=/home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/bin/php-config --enable-memcache &&     PREFIX=/home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/ make &&     cp modules/* /home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/lib/ &&     touch /home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/etc/conf.d/memcache.ini &&     echo 'extension=/home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/lib/memcache.so' > /home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/etc/conf.d/memcache.ini
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /tmp/ &&      wget http://pecl.php.net/get/APC-3.1.13.tgz &&     tar zxvf APC-3.1.13.tgz &&     cd APC-3.1.13 &&     /home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/bin/phpize &&     ./configure --with-php-config=/home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/bin/php-config &&     PREFIX=/home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/ make &&     cp modules/* /home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/lib/ &&     touch /home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/etc/conf.d/apc.ini &&     echo 'extension=/home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/lib/apc.so' > /home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/etc/conf.d/apc.ini

CmdLine: cd /tmp/ &&     wget http://downloads.zend.com/guard/5.5.0/ZendGuardLoader-php-5.3-linux-glibc23-x86_64.tar.gz &&     tar -zxvf ZendGuardLoader-php-5.3-linux-glibc23-x86_64.tar.gz &&     cd ZendGuardLoader-php-5.3-linux-glibc23-x86_64 &&     cp php-5.3.x/* /home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/lib/ &&     touch /home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/etc/conf.d/zend_guard_loader.ini &&     echo 'zend_extension=/home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/lib/ZendGuardLoader.so' > /home/.phpenv/versions/5.3.29/etc/conf.d/zend_guard_loader.ini
